member.name: IDirectWriterLock.HaveWriteAccess
member.summary: The HaveWriteAccess method indicates whether the write lock has been taken.

returns.para: This method can return one of these values.

| Return code | Description | |----------------|---------------| |S_OK | The storage object is currently locked for write access.| |S_FALSE | The storage object is not currently locked for write access.|

member.name: IDirectWriterLock.ReleaseWriteAccess
member.summary: The ReleaseWriteAccess method releases the write lock previously obtained.

returns.para: This method can return one of these values.
| Return code | Description | |----------------|---------------| |S_OK | The write lock was successfully released.|

member.name: IDirectWriterLock.WaitForWriteAccess
member.summary: The WaitForWriteAccess method obtains exclusive write access to a storage object.
member.param: Specifies the time in milliseconds that this method blocks while waiting to obtain exclusive write access to the storage object. If dwTimeout is zero, the method does not block waiting for exclusive access for writing. The INFINITE time-out defined in the Platform SDK is allowed for dwTimeout.

returns.para: This method can return one of these values.

| Return code | Description | |----------------|---------------| |S_OK | The caller has successfully obtained exclusive write access to the storage.| |S_FALSE | This method was called again without an intervening call to IDirectWriterLock.ReleaseWriteAccess.| |STG_E_INUSE | The specified time-out expired without obtaining exclusive write access.|

member.name: IDirectWriterLock
member.summary: TheIDirectWriterLock interface enables a single writer to obtain exclusive write access to a root storage object opened in direct mode while allowing concurrent access by multiple readers. This single-writer, multiple-reader mode does not require the overhead of making a snapshot copy of the storage for the readers.
